title: Finding traces of mathi after prayer
transcript: what's the ruling on a person who prays and after prayer when he visits the toilet he finds traces of prosthetic fluid of methi so is his prayer valid the answer is yes as long as he does not know when this came out and he thought that he was pure and he prayed on this assumption and he has no concrete evidence that this came before wudu or after would most likely it became after he performed his Salah we don't know then the default states that his salat is valid and there's no problem in that inshallah he
